Reference

Prepare

Setups before running workflows.

setCloudEnv()

Setup Google Cloud Account and Project

cloneWorkspace()

Clone template workspace

currentInput()

Check the current input arguments

findInputName()

Find the root entity name

updateInput()

Update the input

Run

Run workflows implemented in Terra

runWorkflow()

Launch Terra workflow

stopWorkflow()

Abort submitted job

monitorWorkflow()

Check the status of submitted jobs

Result

Monitor the workflow progress and access the outputs

getOutput()

Download output files from Terra

Others

availableAnalysis()

Find the available analysis

getDashboard()

Print out Dashboard contents
